bioconda.name: artemis
bioconda.summary: A set of Java genome visualization tools including the Artemis genome browser & annotation tool, ACT DNA sequence comparison viewer, DNA Plotter image generation tool and the BamView BAM/CRAM file viewer.

biocontainers.name: artemis
biocontainers.summary: Free genome browser and annotation tool that allows visualisation of sequence features, next generation data and the results of analyses within the context of the sequence, and also its six-frame translation.

biotools.summary: Free genome browser and annotation tool that allows visualisation of sequence features, next generation data and the results of analyses within the context of the sequence, and also its six-frame translation.

bioschemas.name: Artemis
bioschemas.summary: Free genome browser and annotation tool that allows visualisation of sequence features, next generation data and the results of analyses within the context of the sequence, and also its six-frame translation.
